name: Falcon
bio: With a mental connection to all birds and a suit that gives him wings to fly, The Falcon has been both the partner to Captain America and an Avenger himself. Whether as a super hero or in his secret identity of social worker Sam Wilson, The Falcon dedicates his life to standing up for others.
powers: Falcon is an excellent bird trainer, skilled martial artist and gymnast. Thanks to his wing harness, he has flight ability. What really sets him apart, however, is his empathic link with his pet falcon and his ability to control birds.
